MemoryInfobox.name: A Message Delivered
MemoryInfobox.description: 'Armed with one thousand questions about her defective Spear of Leonidas|spear, Kassandra went to find a Tomb of Phaiax|hidden Aletheia to seek answers.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey – Assassin's Creed Crossover Stories'
MemoryInfobox.previous: Not All Treasure Should Be Found

General_Description: '''A Message Delivered''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] in 2018 through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra met with [[Aletheia]] in the [[Tomb of Phaiax]], seeking a solution for her [[Spear of Leonidas|disabled spear]] after encountering an [[Treasure Hunter's Apple of Eden|Apple of Eden]].
Section_Outcome: Kassandra was given the task by Aletheia to leave Greece and hunt for Isu artifacts throughout the world to prevent a repeat of the events Kassandra encountered in Greece. However, Kassandra refused to accept the task.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]] – [[Assassin's Creed Crossover Stories]]''
